We refer to Wikipedia articles on video editing for help. The on-screen camera interface displays 4K at 60 fps when the speaker is shooting B-roll because B-roll is recorded with the rear camera, which has a higher resolution and frame rate capability. In contrast, A-roll is recorded with the selfie camera, which has a lower resolution and therefore, a lower frame rate of 25 fps.

Therefore, the answer is (A).
B: He plays back the edited church tower clip where a bird flies across the sky with a visibly smooth speed transition.
